title: raw input
extract: Describes the format of the raw input from a Human Interface Device (HID). RAWINPUT. Contains the raw input from a device. RAWINPUTDEVICE. Defines information for the raw input devices.May 30, 2018
extract_html: Describes the format of the raw input from a Human Interface Device (HID). RAWINPUT. Contains the raw input from a device. RAWINPUTDEVICE. Defines information for the raw input devices.May 30, 2018
